bientity_condition.description: If specified, only check for the entities that fulfills the bi-entity condition.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only check for the entities that fulfills the bi-entity condition.

comparison.description: How the number of entities that are currently riding the entity should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the number of entities that are currently riding the entity should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value the number of entities currently riding the entity should be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value the number of entities currently riding the entity should be compared to.

type.description:
## Passenger Recursive

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/passenger_recursive)

Checks whether any of the entities in the riding chain is the actor entity.

Type ID: `origins:passenger_recursive`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:passenger_recursive",
    "bientity_condition": {
        "type": "origins:actor_condition",
        "condition": {
            "type": "origins:entity_type",
            "entity_type": "minecraft:armor_stand"
        }
    },
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 2
}
```

This example will check if the target entity is being ridden by an armor stand that is also being ridden by an armor stand (and so on).

Checks whether any of the entities in the riding chain is the actor entity.

This example will check if the target entity is being ridden by an armor stand that is also being ridden by an armor stand (and so on).
